word_mean: 开卷，解开卷着的东西，展开

sentence.Network_en: Mack seemed to uncoil slowly up into a standing position.
sentence.Network_cn: 麦克慢慢直起身站了起来。

sentence.Network_en: Dan played with the tangerine peel, letting it uncoil and then coil again.
sentence.Network_cn: 丹摆弄着那片橘子皮，将它不停地展开来卷回去。

sentence.Network_en: Nautical To uncoil ( an anchor cable ) on deck so the anchor may descend easily.
sentence.Network_cn: [航海]解开锚缆:在甲板上解开 ( 缆绳 ) 以便能更快下锚.

entry.tran: （卷绕之物）展开，伸展；展开，将…伸展开
entry.def: If something uncoils or if you uncoil it, it becomes straight after it has been wound or curled up. If someone who is curled up uncoils, they move so that their body becomes straight.

example.ex: He uncoiled the hose and gave them a thorough drenching...
example.tran: 他把软管铺展开来，把它们彻底冲洗了一下。

example.ex: Dan played with the tangerine peel, letting it uncoil and then coil again...
example.tran: 丹摆弄着那片橘子皮，将它不停地展开来卷回去。

auth_sentence.content: Sadly, her vocals are wispy-thin and uncoil faster than a bad perm.
